name: Westport Fuel Systems Inc.
description: Westport Fuel Systems Inc. is a global leader in alternative fuel systems and technologies, primarily focused on natural gas and hydrogen fuel solutions for transportation and industrial applications. The company was established in 1995 and has since developed innovative products that enable cleaner and more efficient fuel usage, significantly reducing greenhouse gas emissions. Westport's advanced technologies allow for the integration of natural gas into existing vehicle platforms and engines, making it a viable alternative to traditional diesel and gasoline fuels. The company specializes in designing and manufacturing fuel systems for a range of applications, including heavy-duty trucks, light-duty vehicles, and marine vessels. Westport is also at the forefront of developing hydrogen fuel technologies, contributing to the transition to zero-emission mobility. With a commitment to sustainability and reducing the carbon footprint of transportation, Westport collaborates with various partners, including OEMs and fleet operators, to promote the adoption of clean fuels and technologies. The company continues to invest in research and development to enhance its product offerings and maintain its competitive edge in the rapidly evolving energy landscape.
